name: Super Earth
startIntroPart1: Freedom's Greetings, protector and propagator of Managed Democracy. Your people have fought hard for their freedom and to grant it to all in the galaxy.  Another world calls for liberation.  Will you answer the call?
startIntroPart2: Oh leader chosen by all, will you once again take the lead and guide your people through the path Lady Liberty has lit? Will you create a new foothold on the long climb to liberty? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your tyranical aspirations will not be tolerated!
attacked: We always knew there were disidents, but we hoped you'd see reason.
defeated: You may have scattered us, but Managed Democracy still lives on our breath!
denounced: I'll be sure to pass on your thoughts to the local Democracy Officer.
introduction: Freedom's Greetings, you bear witness to the bastion of democracy!
hateHello: What business do you have with us?
declaringFriendship: Come, you have proven yourself a friend to Lady Liberty!
uniques: Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Golden Age points]
[+50]% Natural religion spread [in all cities] <during a Golden Age>
